content: Here you can set how often you want to auto sync LDAP users

comment.text: This translation key defines the text that describes the setting for automatic LDAP user synchronization, appearing as a title in a UI component. It's used to provide contextual information about the sync functionality within a PortalSettings page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'սինխրոնիզացնել' (sinkhronizatsnel) is a transliteration of 'synchronize' and while understandable, the more common and preferred term is 'սինքրոնիզացնել' (sink'ronizatsnel).

The translation 'ここでLDAPユーザを自動同期する頻度を設定できます' is technically correct but could be improved for naturalness and clarity. The phrasing '自動同期する頻度' (frequency of automatic synchronization) is a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ここでは、LDAPユーザの自動同期間隔を設定できます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ນີ້ແມ່ນບ່ອນທີ່ທ່ານສາມາດຕັ້ງຄ່າຄວາມຖີ່ທີ່ທ່ານຕ້ອງການໃຫ້ຊິງຂໍ້ມູນຜູ້ໃຊ້ LDAP ໂດຍອັດຕະໂນມັດ" is a bit literal and could be more natural. 'ຊິງຂໍ້ມູນ' (shing khomun) translates to 'take data' which isn't the most accurate way to describe syncing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ນີ້ແມ່ນບ່ອນທີ່ທ່ານສາມາດຕັ້ງຄ່າໄລຍະເວລາໃນການເຊື່ອມໂອນຂໍ້ມູນຜູ້ໃຊ້ LDAP ໂດຍອັດຕະໂນມັດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ເຊື່ອມໂອນ' (cheuam non) is suggested for 'sync' and may be a better fit for the context of data transfer than 'ຊິງຂໍ້ມູນ'.
The word 'realizeze' (realize) is not the most natural fit in this context. While technically correct, 'face' or 'se efectueze' would flow better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aici puteți seta cât de des doriți să se efectueze automat sincronizarea utilizator LDAP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly formal and verbose for a UI element. 'ඔබට...සැකසිය හැකිය' (you can set) is less direct than a more common phrasing. The overall meaning is correct but the tone is off.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තවදුරටත් LDAP පරිශීලකයින් සුමුදාහරණය කිරීමේ ක්‍රම පත්‍රය මෙහිදී සැකසියන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence is long and could benefit from breaking into two shorter sentences for better readability in a UI.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම ස්ථානයේ LDAP පරිශීලකයින් සුමුදාහරණය කිරීමේ ක්‍රම පත්‍රය සැකසිය හැකිය.  ඔබට අවශ්‍ය කාලගම මෙහිදී සකසන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'želiš' (you want) is less formal than the original 'want to'. A more appropriate and formal translation would improve the tone, aligning it with a technical setting. 'Lahko nastavite' (you can set) would be more suitable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tukaj se lahko nastavite, kako pogosto želite samodejno sinhronizirati uporabnike LDAP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'аутоматски' (automatically) is unnecessarily long and can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Овде можете да подесите колико често желите да синхронизујете LDAP кориснике

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'senkronize' is misspelled. The correct spelling is 'senkronize etmek'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Burada LDAP kullanıcılarını ne sıklıkla otomatik olarak senkronize etmek istediğinizi ayarlayabilirsiniz
